title: Bloomberg Markets: Kroll Says Washington `Continuing Stupidity'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Kroll Says Washington `Continuing Stupidity'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Steven Kroll Managing Director Monness Crespi Hardt & Co Discussing investors looking for Democrats and Republicans to work together on tax reform and other policy initiatives of the Trump administration.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
